segments.text: John ! Wait a second ! I was just heading downstairs for a cup of coffee . You want to come ? I ’ Ve got some good news !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . Let me just grab my wallet . You certainly do look happy this morning .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am . Don ’ t worry about getting your wallet . It ’ s my treat .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This is a first ! You must have won the lottery .
segments.speaker: S2
